char * bd::b64dec ( const unsigned char *  data,
size_t *  len 
)

Decode a base64 encoded string into plaintext (returns a buffer).

Parameters:
data A c-style string to decode
len Reference to length of string (to be updated on return)
Returns:
A decoded NULL-terminated c-style string (must be free()d later)

size_t *  len,
char *  dest

Parameters:
data The c-style string to decode
len Reference to length of string (to be updated on return)
dest Reference to the buffer to decode into

String bd::newsplit ( String &  str,
char  delim 
)

Splits off tokens.

Parameters:
str The string to split a token off of
delim The delimiter to tokenize with This will modify the given string to remove the first token, which is returned. If no more tokens exist, the remaining string is returned and the string becomes "". Future calls will return a blank String("")
